name: John1612whentheSpiritoftruthcomes
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
After almost been killed did I get a new home with a garden. I am light disabled today and can't walk in stairs. When looking at my new home before moving in standing alone in my empty new home did I hear a voice telling me that this should be a gathering place. I didn't knew what it ment but just moving in to my new home did we got the Covid-19 virus and I was alone in my home and walk out in the garden away from other people. In October 2020 did I hear in the air that I should do a PODCAST and I learn what it was but didn't knew what to do with it as I had no friends or family to be my guest. Suddenly came a spirit to me in my recording of the Podcast and this spirit who was Jesus mother Mary talked to me and those who listen to my podcast. Now most all episodes in my Podcast are visit of spirits and I know today that my home should and have been a gathering place for the spirits from heaven. They explain how it's look like in heaven and I also enter in to heaven and my listener learn how those in heaven see earth, how they look at our planet. They come with warnings and advices. Sometimes GOD ELOHIM is coming and talk. It is about healing energy to my listener and encouragement that only those in the spirit world can give us.

I was told when I was in Jerusalem in year 2016 from GOD that I should do my DNA. Living in Sweden didn't I think I had any special in my DNA but as GOD told me did I understand it was something HE wanted to show me. And in my DNA I saw my mother's line and had to make one more DNA-test to look at hers lineage because it was going down to Israel and Jesus. My mother's line is connected to all Royals all over the world and the royal line did started in middle-east and in the tribe the Frank that is said had that woman who was married to Jesus and their daughter came up to Europe and all the Royals in Europe.

I saw my father's lineage was also connected to Israel but the line is going over Turkey in a Rabbic line.

I am talking about my life from year 2000 when on my way to do a suicide just before doing it a Higher Priest from heaven stood in my home and he pulled GOD ELOHIM to my home. I didn't see GOD but I heard HIS voice and HE told me about my future. I never thought I could do what HE said but today have I done everything HE said I should do.

Instead a suicide did I left everything I had in Sweden and took a flight to USA. I was walking as homeless in USA for 1260 days before GOD allowed me to come back to Sweden.

Today am I marked of GOD. I have got 3 dots segul that am the sign of a Prophet. I got a mark from GOD in my forehead when I did a recording in an episode and I was told that I am in the light and am the light here on earth.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
